title: pATalE nI bhakti
sahitya:
pATalE nI bhakti pATalA pATalO amrta puTUTalE


anupallavi

  alladE A bATa alladE bhaktigI tAlApa madhu vAhinI tarangAlavE


caraNam    grOlitini madhu rasamu mrOgitini muraLInai vrAlitini nI mrOlakEla kai-konumammA
     A bATasArEnu A pATalE nEnu A madhuvu grOlagA madhupa munu nEnu
